spy.英释: someone whose job is to find out secret information about another country, organization, or group

sit.中释: (Sit)人名；(东南亚国家华语)硕；(罗)西特

joy.英释: to be happy because of something

tip.中释: 小费；尖端；小建议，小窍门；轻拍
tip.英释: the end of something, especially something pointed

sex.中释: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别
sex.英释: to find out whether an animal is male or female

bet.英释: to risk money on the result of a race, game, competition, or other future event

aim.英释: something you hope to achieve by doing something

lie.英释: something that you say or write that you know is untrue

cup.英释: If you cup your hands, you make them into a curved shape like a cup

row.英释: to make a boat move across water using  oar s

sea.英释: the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface

son.中释: 儿子；孩子（对年轻人的称呼）；男性后裔

bay.英释: If a dog or wolf bays, it makes loud, long cries

lay.中释: 位置；短诗；花纹方向；叙事诗；性伙伴

mix.英释: the particular combination of things or people in a group or thing

hip.中释: 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的
hip.英释: doing things or done according to the latest fashion

fan.英释: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

tie.中释: 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负
tie.英释: a long narrow piece of cloth tied in a knot around the neck, worn by men

sad.中释: 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）
sad.英释: not happy, especially because something unpleasant has happened

bid.英释: an offer to pay a particular price for something, especially at an  auction

arm.英释: to provide weapons for yourself, an army, a country etc in order to prepare for a fight or a war

jog.英释: a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

hop.中释: 蹦跳,跳跃；跳舞；一次飞行的距离

eve.中释: 夏娃； 前夕；傍晚；重大事件关头

era.英释: a period of time in history that is known for a particular event, or for particular qualities

wit.英释: that is to say; namely (used to introduce statements, as in legal documents)

fur.中释: 用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装

fog.中释: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
fog.英释: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

dam.英释: a special wall built across a river or stream to stop the water from flowing, especially in order to make a lake or produce electricity

ton.英释: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 2,240 pounds or 1,016 kilograms in Britain, and 2,000 pounds or 907.2 kilograms in the US

rot.中释: （表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了

sir.中释: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师
sir.英释: used when speaking to a man in order to be polite or show respect

sin.英释: to do something that is against religious rules and is considered to be an offence against God

sue.中释: (Sue)人名；(日)末(名)；(法)休；(英)休(女子教名Susan、Susanna的昵称)

tax.英释: Tax is an amount of money that you have to pay to the government so that it can pay for public services such as road and schools

tap.英释: a piece of equipment for controlling the flow of water, gas etc from a pipe or container

ban.英释: an official order that prevents something from being used or done

pen.英释: to write something such as a letter, a book etc, especially using a pen

pet.英释: a plan, idea, or subject that you particularly like or are interested in

nod.英释: to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding

jet.英释: if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole

jam.中释: 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎
jam.英释: if a lot of people or vehicles jam a place, they fill it so that it is difficult to move

rap.英释: a series of quick sharp hits or knocks

rag.英释: to laugh at someone or play tricks on them

rob.英释: to steal money or property from a person, bank etc

rod.英释: a long thin pole or bar

rim.英释: to be around the edge of something

rib.英释: to furnish or support with a rib or ribs

rug.中释: 小地毯；毛皮地毯；男子假发
rug.英释: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration

rub.英释: A massage can be referred to as a rub

kin.中释: 同类的；有亲属关系的；性质类似的

sew.英释: to use a needle and thread to make or repair clothes or to fasten something such as a button to them

sob.英释: A sob is one of the noises that you make when you are crying

ski.英释: You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

sun.英释: to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

tag.中释: 尾随，紧随；连接；起浑名；添饰

hay.英释: to cut, dry, and store (grass, clover, etc) as fodder

pat.英释: to lightly touch someone or something several times with your hand flat, especially to give comfort

pan.中释: 淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）；[非正式用语]严厉的批评
pan.英释: to wash soil in a metal container in order to separate gold from other substances

zoo.英释: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them

bag.中释: 猎获；把…装入袋中；占据，私吞；使膨大

pea.英释: a round green seed that is cooked and eaten as a vegetable, or the plant on which these seeds grow

bee.英释: a black and yellow flying insect that makes  honey  and can sting you

pit.中释: 使竞争；窖藏；使凹下；去…之核；使留疤痕
pit.英释: to put small marks or holes in the surface of something

pot.英释: If you pot a young plant, or part of a plant, you put it into a container filled with soil, so it can grow there

pub.英释: a building in Britain where alcohol can be bought and drunk, and where meals are often served

gum.中释: 用胶粘，涂以树胶；使…有粘性
gum.英释: to stick together or in place with gum

gut.中释: 简单的；本质的，根本的；本能的，直觉的
gut.英释: A gut feeling is based on instinct or emotion rather than reason

gun.中释: 用枪射击；加大油门快速前进

bug.英释: to put a  bug (=  small piece of electronic equipment  )  somewhere secretly in order to listen to conversations

ink.英释: a coloured liquid that you use for writing, printing or drawing

hug.英释: the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

ash.英释: the soft grey powder that remains after something has been burned

awe.英释: a feeling of great respect and liking for someone or something

fax.英释: a letter or message that is sent in electronic form down a telephone line and then printed using a special machine

ego.英释: the opinion that you have about yourself

egg.英释: to urge or incite, esp to daring or foolish acts

oil.英释: to put oil onto part of a machine or part of something that moves, to help it to move or work more smoothly

gay.英释: someone who is homosexual, especially a man

owl.中释: 猫头鹰；枭；惯于晚上活动的人
owl.英释: a bird with large eyes that hunts at night

fry.英释: to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil

opt.英释: to choose one thing or do one thing instead of another

ore.英释: rock or earth from which metal can be obtained

flu.英释: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot

fix.英释: to have a problem that is difficult to solve

lap.英释: if water laps something or laps against something such as the shore or a boat, it moves against it or hits it in small waves

cue.英释: to give someone a sign that it is the right moment for them to speak or do something, especially during a performance

log.英释: a thick piece of wood from a tree

cow.英释: to frighten someone in order to make them do something

leg.英释: one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect

ebb.英释: if the tide ebbs, it flows away from the shore

dye.英释: to give something a different colour using a dye

tub.中释: 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗

mob.中释: 大举包围，围攻；蜂拥进入

mug.英释: to make silly expressions with your face or behave in a silly way, especially for a photograph or in a play

mud.中释: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
mud.英释: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

tow.英释: to pull a vehicle or ship along behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain

dip.中释: 下沉，下降；倾斜；浸渍，蘸湿
dip.英释: a slight decrease in the amount of something

dig.英释: a joke or remark that you make to annoy or criticize someone

cat.英释: a small animal with four legs that people often keep as a pet

her.英释: belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

bat.英释: a small animal like a mouse with wings that flies around at night

cut.英释: a wound that is caused when something sharp cuts your skin

car.英释: a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers

art.中释: 美术，艺术；技术，技艺；文科，人文科学
art.英释: the use of painting, drawing, sculpture etc to represent things or express ideas

cap.英释: to have a particular substance on top

man.英释: a person, either male or female – used especially in formal situations or in the past

cry.英释: a loud sound expressing a strong emotion such as pain, fear, or pleasure

fin.英释: one of the thin body parts that a fish uses to swim
